title: Animal Kitabu
description: 1968, hardcover edition, Random House, NY. 293 pages. Excellent B&W illustrations / photos throughout. Written by a conservationist, the author describes commercial safaris, poachers, and menaced species in Africa. Concentrates on the great cats and apes. Written by a man who feels for and understands Africa's wildlife. Very nicely written. Anyone who loves animals will appreciate this title.
author: Jean-Pierre Hallet
